pages.text: Padlocks are a way to provide buffs to the player. Via conjuration, and potentially some help from the Grimoire, you can bound a padlock to a Prince of Sin!$(br2)This is when you are able to be granted these abilities.$(br2)Of course, these buffs depend on the padlock/price of sin.
The conjuration to create the Unbound Padlock for the Prince of Lust is shown above.$(br2)There currently exists 7 padlocks, each for a Prince of Sin.
These entries may also be useful in your studies.
